channel.title: Two questions
channel.description:
q1 where can i edit what commands for what player rights?
q2 where can i change the text that appears when you log into your server.
thanks.

item.title: Two questions
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

Go on that named: ‘‘Client’’ then that text writed there like this welcome to blascape then go to your client.java and press CTRL + B then write in welcome to that text writed there
to change the commands for player rights
to make mods ban press CTRL + B and type in Banuser then there is writed player right > 2 remove the 2 and make it to 1
so mods can ban after you are done then compile then run server

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 13, 2009, 07:45:32 am[/size][hr]Easy way, you need to learn about Java dude…

Read full topic
